Rulings.Edison:
●Blowback Dragon's effect does target. The target is the selected card.
●If your opponent uses Blowback Dragon on a Trap Card, you can use Fake Trap to save it.
●You select the target of Blowback Dragon's effect when you activate the effect, BEFORE flipping the coins.

Rulings.Base: 1. The effect of "Blowback Dragon" does target. The target is the selected card.\n2. If your opponent uses "Blowback Dragon" on a Trap Card, you can use "Fake Trap" to save it.\n3. You select the target of the effect of "Blowback Dragon" when you activate the effect, BEFORE flipping the coins.
